attributes.action: Child and adult age limits should be standardised throughout the country for items like bus fares and in restraunts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like bus fairs and child prices to be standardised at the age of 18 so that minors will not be charged for items, as currently i have seen restraunts advertising a "child buffet" for £3.99 and then going in and finding that their limit of "child" is 8yrs old, or the local bus company saying that you have to pay adult bus fare when you reach fourteen.
